name: TechFlow Merch Store - Complete AI Assistant v2.2.1

parameters.query: WITH products_list AS (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object('id', p.id, 'name', p.name, 'category', c.name, 'price', p.price, 'description', p.description) ORDER BY c.sort_order, p.name) AS products FROM products p JOIN categories c ON p.category_id = c.id WHERE p.is_active = TRUE), faq_list AS (SELECT json_agg(json_build_object('question', question, 'answer', answer) ORDER BY sort_order) AS faq FROM faq) SELECT (SELECT products FROM products_list) AS products, (SELECT faq FROM faq_list) AS faq;
=SELECT add_item_to_cart({{ $('Extract Message').first().json.user_id }}, '{{ JSON.parse($json.tool_args).product_id }}', {{ JSON.parse($json.tool_args).qty }}) AS result;
=SELECT confirm_order_from_cart({{ $('Extract Message').first().json.user_id }}, '{{ JSON.parse($json.tool_args).phone }}', '{{ JSON.parse($json.tool_args).address }}') AS result;
=SELECT image_path, name FROM products WHERE id = '{{ JSON.parse($json.tool_args).product_id }}';
SELECT tg_user_id, name FROM admins WHERE is_active = TRUE;

=SELECT role, content, tool_calls, tool_call_id, sort_order
FROM conversation_history 
WHERE chat_id = '{{ $json.chat_id }}'
ORDER BY created_at ASC, sort_order ASC

=INSERT INTO conversation_history (user_id, chat_id, role, content, tool_calls, tool_call_id, sort_order)
VALUES (
  {{ $json.user_id }},
  '{{ $json.chat_id }}',
  '{{ $json.role }}',
  '{{ $json.content }}',
  {{ $json.tool_calls ? "'" + $json.tool_calls + "'::jsonb" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.tool_call_id ? "'" + $json.tool_call_id + "'" : 'NULL' }},
  {{ $json.sort_order || 0 }}
)
